sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>leader</radical> who lives in a <radical>mountain</radical> is a <kanji>hermit</kanji>. The only thing this hermit is a leader of now is mountain goats. This hermit dislikes people so that’s why he lives in a mountain now.
meaningInfo: Imagine this odd hermit leading mountain goats around the mountain, marching to the beat of a drum. It’s a strange sight indeed.
readingMnemonic: One day the <kanji>hermit</kanji> was leading the mountain goats around and he ran into a <reading>cen</reading>taur <ja>せん</ja>. The centaur said that he was the rightful leader of these mountain goats so the centaur challenged the hermit to a duel.
readingInfo: Picture this old hermit fighting this centaur in a duel. Who do you think is gonna win? Hear the hermit screaming in agony as the centaur demolishes him.
